item.description:
The Greater Hartford Festival of Jazz was originally conceived by Paul Brown, noted Hartford jazz bassist and music educator who produced the Monday Night Jazz Concerts in Bushnell Park for 25 years.

The Greater Hartford Festival of Jazz's mission is to expose,  educate their ever-growing audiences while celebrating America's only true art form, JAZZ, by presenting over twenty-five hours of music performed by internationally acclaimed, world-class jazz musicians and artists. 


 

Currently, The Greater Hartford Festival of Jazz has grown to be the largest FREE jazz event in New England, featuring great jazz artists from around the world, the USA, as well as young and up-and-coming performers from the local region, averaging an attendance of over 45,000, and attracting more than 55,000 fans during the three day Festival in 2010.

Now in its twentieth year, The Greater Hartford Festival of Jazz Stage has been graced with the presence of many outstanding and notable jazz bands and vocalists. 

With Connecticut's State Capitol Building and Hartford's skyline providing a beautiful, dramatic backdrop as the sun sets and the stars rise in the night sky and on stage, audiences are sure to enjoy a wonderful summer evening of jazz.  Best of all its all FREE!!!!

 

Saturday
4:30 pm -  Latanya Farrell
6:00 pm -  Curtis Haywood
7:30 pm -  Cindy Bradley
9:00 pm - Groove Project is:
                 Carl Carter, Bass
                 Matt Marshak, Guitar
                Steve William, Drums
                 Jay Rowe, Keys
                 Paul ‘Shilts’ Weimar, Sax
                 Steve Cole, Sax
10:30 pm -  Jus Us - The Dance Party

I HAVE ANOTHER ENGAGEMENT BEFORE BUT WILL STOP BY SOMETIME AFTER 6:30 PM. SO THIS IS A CASUAL MEETUP!  YOU MAY OF COURSE SIGN UP FOR THE EVENT. I WILL MOST LIKELY BE BY THE BIG SHADED TREE ON THE LEFT SIDE OF THE STAGE BUT SOMETIME AFTER 6:30 PM AS PREVIOUSLY STATED AND LEAVING AT 9:30 PM.  BRING BLANKETS AND CHAIRS AND SNACKS TO SHARE. HOPE TO SEE YOU THERE!! JOLETA
item.how_to_find_us: My tel# 214-679-6256 please call me to locate where the group will be. There is a nice shaded tree area close to the left side of the stage, I was thinking meeting in that area. I will be there around 6:30 pm.
item.name: Night 2: Greater Hartford Festival of Jazz (Casual Meetup)
